t: How to set up lighting groups on the Amazon Alexa? - Lighting Solutions England
s: Open the Alexa app, ensuring you have at least 3 lights synced with your Alexa Click the settings icon at the bottom right of the screen Click the plus at the top right of the screen Click add group Name the group of lights Click next Select the lights that you wish to add
